total_transacted: Total transacted between BRL and USD stablecoins in UniswapV3 in the current month
total_swaps: Total swaps made in the current month
pool_fee_description: The fee charged by the pool for the swap operation.
disconnect_wallet_modal_question: Are you sure you want to disconnect your wallet?
confirm_swap_text: Are you sure you want to swap {{amountIn}} {{tokenIn}} -> {{amountOut}} {{tokenOut}}?
connect_wallet_to_view: Connect your wallet to view the SplitPayment contract monitor.
about_desc_1: This project is a Proof of Concept (PoC) of a Decentralized Application (DApp) for payment processing with split payment and automatic tax collection, built on the Polygon blockchain. The main objective is to demonstrate the feasibility of automating complex financial processes in a transparent and secure way using smart contracts.
about_desc_2: The application allows a user to make a payment in one stablecoin (like BRZ) and, automatically, the system performs a swap to another stablecoin (like USDC), calculates a fee on the transacted amount, sends this fee to a designated tax wallet, and transfers the remaining amount to the final recipient.
tech_frontend_desc: React with TypeScript, using the ethers.js library to interact with the blockchain, styled-components for styling, and i18next for internationalization.
tech_backend_desc: Developed in Python using FastAPI for the REST API. The backend is responsible for managing the Uniswap V3 pool data and providing endpoints for the frontend searching for data in GraphQL provider called TheGraph.
tech_blockchain_desc: The DApp proposes to run on the Polygon network, with local development facilitated by forking the mainnet via Anvil. Developed in Solidity, with the Hardhat framework for compilation, testing, and deployment. It uses the standard security contracts from OpenZeppelin.
tech_testing_desc: Unit and integration tests with Chai and Mocha, as well as test scripts to simulate interactions and verify contract security.
feature_swap: Token Swap: Integration with the Uniswap V3 router for atomic token swaps.
feature_tax: Tax Collection: Automatic calculation and transfer of a percentage of the value to a tax wallet.
feature_monitoring: On-Chain Monitoring: Dedicated pages to view the contract balance and emitted payment events.
feature_security: Security: Protected administrative functions, allowing only the contract owner to make critical changes.
author_info: Developed by Arthur Duarte as a Final Course Project (TCC) for CEFET/RJ.
swap_more_info: For more information about the swap,
no_swaps_found: No swaps found for the given pool ID and date range
pool_not_found_error: Pool not found. Please check the pool ID and try again.
swap_error: An error occurred during the swap, please try again: {{error}}
swap_error_generic: An error occurred during the swap, please try again.
swap_error_invalid_input: Invalid input for the swap. Please check the values and try again.
